posts.title: Titanic
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

posts.title: Maleficent
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: Maleficent is a powerful fairy living in the Moors, a magical forest realm bordering a human kingdom. As a young girl, Maleficent meets and falls in love with a human peasant boy named Stefan.

posts.title: Toy Story 4
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: With her wings and staff, this goddess's attacks cover a wide range. With her up smash, neutral special, and side special, she can create a ranged attack in almost every direction except for directly beneath her! Keep the pressure on your opponents from a distance with ranged attacks!

posts.title: Siempre a tu lado
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: He's the protagonist of Final Fantasy VII. You can also select his Advent Children outfit. Charging up his Limit Gauge increases his special move abilities! Land a powerful hit!. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Pellentesque pellentesque massa nec malesuada interdum.

posts.title: The proposal
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: Attacks with a variety of weapons. Covering opponents with ink leads to more and more damageâ€”plus these Inklings are really fashionable! Good news: The new fighters, Inkling and Ridley, have Super Smash Bros. series amiibo figures on the way! #SmashBros

posts.title: The pianist
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: Although not as powerful as Samus, her speed is exceptional! Her Paralyzer not only has the ability to stun opponents, but it can also turn into a whip. For her Final Smash, she dons her suit and fires a powerful laser!

posts.title: Coco
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: Link has been redesigned to match his appearance in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. He can now pick up arrows he's fired, and his bombs have been upgraded to remote bombs, so you can set them off when the timing is just right!

posts.title: Moana
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: He's smaller and faster than Link. His bombs explode with a unique anime-style. For his Final Smash, he emits light from his left hand and any opponents hit by it are trapped in the Triforce, subject to a punishing gauntlet of attacks. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

posts.title: Resident Evil
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: He can overwhelm his opponents with his quick movements, and his specials don't leave him open for counterattacks. His costume and voice have been redone to match his appearance in Star Fox Zero. This Fox is brand new! Come on!

posts.title: Orphan
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: The leader of the Star Wolf mercenary team makes his grand return after 10 years! He puts his sharp claws to good use in wild attacks, and his Final Smash is an all-out attack by Team Star Wolf! If Fox or Falco is in the battle, you may hear a unique line of dialog.

posts.title: IT
posts.subTitle: Super Smash Bros Ultimate
posts.body: THE super princess. Watch out for her powerful kicks while she's airborne. Using her down special, she picks vegetables and throws them at her opponents. Sometimes she even gets items...like a Bob-omb!
